A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie had some cool visuals but overall it ruined so much of the franchise with stuff that made no sense. the plot holes still bother me on a daily basis - if destroying an enemy ship just took jumping to light speed to destroy it then why are there even any Star Wars movies and why even waste time building giant ships\, how did Rey learn to fight with a lightsaber without practice\, everything about Holdo\, Finns\, and Rose's entire plot\, the complete waste of a character Snoke was\, etc.......It's like whoever wrote the script didn't see the previous movie or have any idea what Star Wars was.
